          What's Up Doc? Multiple Sclerosis Disease-modifying Therapy
         
 UCR Health presents “What’s up Doc?” a Health and Wellness Webinar Series for all ages. 
 
Sensitive discussions and timely information on medical challenges that can free you from disease and disability. 
 
Series features our UCR Health physicians. These experts will give you the information you can use on your bodies during important moments in your life. You will walk away with clarity about issues you might be facing and how to successfully and confidently deal with them! 
 
Topic: 
Multiple Sclerosis Disease-modifying Therapy 
 
Speaker: 
Dr. Elizabeth Morrison-Banks 
 
This event is free to attend. 
 
 Dial-In Information 
   
 https://ucr.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJAvd-GgrToqG9NP-DLsqiQQO2hatuM9U0GE 
 
 
  Wednesday, June 16 at 12:00pm
